name: Man over board (ZeldaFan, Hannah)
description:
Man over board, is our game made for the ‘pirate’ Game Jam in only 7 days. In the game, you’re trapped on a ship after trying to start a mutiny. Your aim is to escape from the ship and steal the evil captains valuables. On the journey to freedom, you meet different characters. Both good and evil, you choose your path on what to say and how to act. Try not to get reported as you sneak through the rooms to find the things you will need on your escape. With a little luck you might actually make it to freedom.

Controls:

  • Walk with arrow keys or "a" and "d" 
  • jump or climb ladders  with "space" key
  • select answers with mouse klick 

Credits: 

  • ZeldaFan: programming, composing, storyline, map design
  • Hannah (T_R_H.M) : idea, storyline, dialogues, drawing, animation, map design

Special thanks to:

  •  The Gruffalo for coming up with the title^^
  • Jay for proof reading the dialogues^^
  • And Nathan for emotional support and help with the general problems of life^^

Note: This game will receive an update soon.
